text: tumhaare lie un donon girohon mein ek nishaanee hai jo (badr kee) ladaee mein ek-doosare ke muqaabil hue. ek giroh allaah ke maarg mein lad raha tha, jabaki doosara vidharmee tha. ye apanee aankhon dekh rahe the ki ve unase dugane hai. allaah apanee sahaayata se jise chaahata hai, shakti pradaan karata hai. drshtivaan logon ke lie isamen badee shiksha-saamagree hai
